info.description:
API untuk sistem PKM (Program Kreativitas Mahasiswa) UMM
Backend yang mendukung pengajuan, review, dan manajemen PKM
info.title: Student RIRES Backend API

post.description: Login untuk administrator dari database lokal
Login mahasiswa menggunakan NIM via API external
Login pegawai/reviewer menggunakan email via API external

get.description: Get currently logged in user information from JWT token
Get list of kategori PKM with pagination
Get kategori PKM detail by ID
Get list of menus with pagination (flat structure)
Get menus in tree/hierarchical structure (for sidebar/navigation)
Get menu detail by ID
Get list of parameter form with pagination
Get all parameters for specific kategori (for dynamic form rendering)
Get parameter form detail by ID

post.description: Mahasiswa (ketua) creates new PKM title submission with team members

put.description: Ketua revises PKM title (only allowed when status = REVISI)

get.description: Get all submissions created by authenticated mahasiswa
Get detailed information of a pengajuan (only if user is part of the team)

put.description: Ketua revises proposal by uploading new file (only allowed when status_proposal = REVISI)

post.description: Ketua uploads proposal PDF/DOC/DOCX (only allowed when status_judul = ACC)

get.description: Get list of status review with pagination
Get status review detail by ID
Get list of registration periods with pagination (admin only)

post.description: Create new registration period and set as active (deactivate others)

get.description: Get currently active registration period (for checking if registration is open)
Get registration period detail by ID
Test generating kode pengajuan
Test querying mahasiswa and pegawai from external databases
Test status flow validation
Get list of user levels with pagination
Get user level detail by ID
Get list of users with pagination

post.description: Create new user with hashed password

get.description: Get user detail by ID

tipe_input.description: text, textarea, number, file, radio, select, etc

warna.description: gray, blue, green, yellow, red, etc

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
